item.title: Dr. Martin Luther King Jr.:: Constructive social change will bring certain tranquility; evasions will merely encourage turmoil. <-- 'Where Do We Go From Here: Chaos or Community?', 1967.
item.description:
Dr. Martin Luther King Jr.:: ‚ÄúConstructive social change will bring certain tranquility; evasions will merely encourage turmoil. ‚Äú <- ‚ÄúWhere Do We Go From Here: Chaos or Community?‚Äù, 1967. <‚Äì Read the book ‚Äì> ‚ÄòWhere Do We Go From Here: Chaos or Community?‚Äô, 1967, wiki page <‚Äì 2025 seems to be 1967 all over again.

Previously

  • January 20, 2025 Dr. Martin Luther King Jr.:: Darkness cannot drive out darkness; only light can do that. Hate cannot drive out hate; only love can do that.

item.title: Recipes that work:: Tortang Talong Manyaman/Masarap :-) It's basically a roasted egglant omelette with fish sauce; Barb adds 1 tablespoon of fish sauce and 1/2 tbsp of cornstarch to help the binding Iankewks:: Tortang Talong (Filipino Eggplant Omelette)
item.description: Discovered: Feb 2, 2025 18:26 Recipes that work:: Tortang Talong Manyaman/Masarap :-) It‚Äôs basically a roasted egglant omelette with fish sauce; Barb adds 1 tablespoon of fish sauce and 1/2 tbsp of cornstarch to help the binding Iankewks:: Tortang Talong (Filipino Eggplant Omelette) <‚Äì QUOTE: The humble tortang talong is a simple eggplant egg dish, made by charring eggplant until soft and mixing it along with scrambled egg until they merge into one. ... My parents cooked this dish almost every week at home, and I honestly never bothered to try it until I caved one day (one of my best decisions by far). ...A simple dish, but it‚Äôs one of the best ways to really showcase the flavor and versatility of the eggplant. It‚Äôs the main reason why eggplant had quickly become my favorite vegetable! <‚Äì See also: Jacqui Mackenzie:: Tortang Talong (Filipino Eggplant Omelet)

item.title: David Crawshaw's sketch.dev LLM hello world gets into a loop abut deleting duplicate files
item.description:
Discovered: Jan 30, 2025 08:14 David Crawshaw‚Äôs sketch.dev LLM hello world gets into a loop abut deleting duplicate files ‚Äì> See David Crashaw‚Äôs blog post: How I program with LLMs

sketch.dev‚Äôs LLM goes into a loop with the following output over and over again

I see the current program has some file organization issues and inconsistencies. Let me help clean this up by:

Deleting the duplicate test file at the root level (/pkg_test.go) Deleting the empty file at the root level (/pkg.go)

I‚Äôll ask about what additional improvements you‚Äôd like to make to this greeting program.

item.title: Me:: 'Hyperchrome' is just a fun filter LOL Pearla:: Professional Camera App with Film Simulations
item.description:
Discovered: Jan 30, 2025 06:35 Me:: ‚ÄòHyperchrome‚Äô is just a fun filter LOL Pearla:: Professional Camera App with Film Simulations <‚Äì QUOTE: Hyperchrome is a portal to a world brimming with electrifying colours and boundless creativity. Imagine stepping into a photograph where every hue is amplified, pulsating with an energy that ignites the senses. That‚Äôs the magic of Hyperchrome.

Recipe:

  • Film Simulation: Afthonos
  • Highlights/Shadows: -30/0
  • Colour Balance Cyan/Red: 0
  • Colour Balance Magenta/Green: -2
  • Colour Balance Yellow/Blue: -1
  • Colour Chrome Effect: On
  • Colour Chrome Effect Blue: Off
  • Saturation: 0
  • Vibrance: 0
  • Midtone Details: 0
  • Grain: Weak
  • Grain Strength: Small
  • Bloom: 0

item.title: Gitingest:: Turn any Git repository into a simple text digest of its codebase. This is useful for feeding a codebase into any LLM.
item.description: Discovered: Jan 28, 2025 15:35 Gitingest:: Turn any Git repository into a simple text digest of its codebase. This is useful for feeding a codebase into any LLM. <‚Äì super cool but probably not useful for large repos like https://github.com/thunderbird/github-action-thunderbird-aaq which gitingest turns into a 37 million token file (I excluded all ruby source code and just included the CSV files of SUMO questions and answers)

item.description: Discovered: Jan 28, 2025 07:18 Me:: Centralized APIs will break see also ·úÅG Dave Winer:: Tw·úÅtter had an API too. It didn‚Äôt make a difference. And AT Proto won‚Äôt either unless there are proven systems that people are actually using that peer with Blüß≤esky‚Äôs servers, so those users can‚Äôt be sold to the billionaire. <‚Äì How many times do we have to learn this lesson :-) ?!?!? My software based on the Tw·úÅtter API version 1 was broken when they broke the API. Same with my software based on the ·úÅnstagram API. Off topic :-) ‚Äì> I learned recently that ·úÅ is Unicode for Tagalog letter i. Long live Unicode keeping ancient scripts alive :-) !!
